description:
Diets fail for a very specific reason: The foundation of literally all diets is flawed.

Once you understand the problem, it is possible to create and follow a diet that will succeed.

However, the flaw will never be found in the diet literature. That data are corrupted.

To understand why diets fail, it is necessary to look to the starvation literature. There the answer will be found.

You might think that this is dry stuff. On the contrary, when you learn the connection between expert diet advice and the schemes concocted to intentionally cause human suffering nutritionally during times of war, you will be amazed!

After you become aware of the reasons why diets fail, you will be presented with a diet plan that is the absolutely simplest ever devised.

Really.

So learn Why Diets Fail, learn the simplest diet on earth and learn how to succeed in an undertaking where the failure rate (not yours) is astronomical (by design).
title: Why Diets Fail
